about_text: GramVartha helps Grampanchayats share official notices and Government Resolutions (GRs) with citizens easily and effectively.
f1_desc: End-to-end encryption ensures your data remains confidential and protected from unauthorized access.
f2_desc: Experience blazing fast performance with our optimized architecture and global CDN network.
f3_desc: Join thousands of active users who contribute to making our platform better every day.
welcome: Stay informed, stay connected with GramVartha
footer: Empowering communities with transparent information and digital governance
tagline: Empowering villages with timely news and updates
